about_the_game:
Project Files for CAT Interstellar
Currently consists of Skeletal Mesh, Animations, Textures, and Control Mechanics Code.
Next step is to add environmental assets of the Martian Surface along with more complicated blueprints to set lighting.

Requires Unreal Engine 4.16.3
detailed_description:
Project Files for CAT Interstellar
Currently consists of Skeletal Mesh, Animations, Textures, and Control Mechanics Code.
Next step is to add environmental assets of the Martian Surface along with more complicated blueprints to set lighting.

Requires Unreal Engine 4.16.3

name: ProjectFiles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Unreal Engine 4.17.1
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Unreal Engine 4.17.1
